relevant_findings.general: alert, oriented to self, place and time. Not in any distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: moist mucous membranes, no cervical lymphadenopathy
relevant_findings.chest: no crackles, bilateral breath sounds present
relevant_findings.abdomen: soft, nondistended. Very mild tenderness around the incision sites and in the RUQ to deep palpation. No rebound.
relevant_findings.incisions: clean, dry, intact with steristrips in place
